structure.unit: Inland Fisheries And Game And Other Natural Resources

law.catch_line: Automatic Firearms, Machine Guns Or Bows; Use Of Tracer Ammunition
law.text: A person shall not use for hunting purposes any type of full automatic firearm, machine gun or submachine gun, or any crossbow, except as provided in section 69, nor use any tracer or incendiary ammunition for hunting or outdoor target shooting purposes except on a skeet, trap, or target range.
